title: [GW beeper] Vocal notif when bosses are up

comments.author: lina adlang.6578
comments.body:
Hello,

This project is currently born 2 days ago (Sat 26 May) and I have a barely functionnal page.
As a player I found that while playing, having a sound warning describing the new event that popped could be a nice add to the current sites, but did not find a new one, so I coded one.

As a newborn project it is currently having some bugs, but seems to works well enough to be released. I have no idea if what i’ve coded will work well if lots of peep are using the page, but lets see …

Currently ongoing addon will be :
- Clean review of all events to add missing ones and remove some useless ones
- Add language support (currently only english voices are generated)
- Identified bugs fixing (various server error)
- Improve that ugly minimalist interface
- Add smarter logs (currently DEV-like)
- Add filter options (world boss, temples …)

I barely tested it under Win7 + IE,firefox,chrome, Linux, Android. Project use php, javascript and need cookie to be enabled.

You may found the project at following link, feel free to add any comments, bugs or functionnality that can be improved.

http://beeper.gw2.hyenasoft.com/

Have fun.
